content.title: 106 YEARS OF SERVICE AND EXCELLENCE.
content.content: With a thousand square feet of retail space, and a true desire to serve, Barclay Rex has become one of the top tobacconists in the city and is the last family-owned tobacconist in New York. As a result of these 106 years of service and excellence in fine tobacco, we dedicate this establishment in the true spirit of its treasured family members and welcome you to Barclay Rex.
